
set(TARGET_NAME vhacd)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/inc ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/public)

file(GLOB_RECURSE VHACD_HEADER_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} *.h)
file(GLOB_RECURSE VHACD_SOURCE_FILES RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} *.cpp *.inl)

set(ALL_CODE_FILES ${VHACD_HEADER_FILES} ${VHACD_SOURCE_FILES})
GROUP_FILES(ALL_CODE_FILES)

add_library(${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${ALL_CODE_FILES})
set_target_properties(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX FOLDER "libraries")
